fields.name: Ben Lawers Walking Poles
fields.description1: Ideal for longer days on the mountains, these dual walking poles are ideal for people seeking stability.
fields.description2: The Ben Lawers Walking Poles are sturdy with highly functional stability and safety reserves but with less weight. Recomended for people up to 180cm height and/ or 75kg.
fields.spec1: Material: Aluminium HTS 6.5
fields.spec2: Diameter: 16/ 14/ 12mm
fields.spec3: Length: 100 - 135cm

fields.name: Ben Challum Aergomed Walking Pole
fields.description1: The Ben Challum is a hiking pole made from high-strength aluminium for universal use.
fields.description2: Whether on hard or soft surfaces: the carbide tip or rubber tip offer you grip and safety on any terrain. The Aergomed grip ensures comfort. Thanks to the TÜV-tested Speed Lock 2 system, you can adjust it easily from 63 cm to 120 cm.
fields.spec1: Material: Aluminium HTS 6.5
fields.spec2: Aergomed grip
fields.spec3: Length: 63 - 120cm

fields.name: Ben Challum Anatomic Walking Pole
fields.description1: The Ben Challum is a hiking pole made from high-strength aluminium for universal use.
fields.description2: Whether on hard or soft surfaces: the carbide tip or rubber tip offer you grip and safety on any terrain. The Anataomically shaped grip ensures comfort. Thanks to the TÜV-tested Speed Lock 2 system, you can adjust it easily from 63 cm to 120 cm.
fields.spec1: Material: Aluminium HTS 6.5
fields.spec2: Anatomically shaped grip
fields.spec3: Length: 63 - 120cm

fields.name: Braemar Walking Poles
fields.description1: Get all the support you need with this anti-shock twin pack which use dampers near the tip to provide a smoother ride.
fields.description2: The sturdy aircraft-grade aluminium pole is teamed with a light EVA handle for a comfortable grip, which extend down for varied grip on uphill terrain. Adjust height quickly and easily with the fast-lock mechanism.
fields.spec1: Aluminium construction with damping
fields.spec2: AQuick-release height adjustability
fields.spec3: Length: 100 - 160cm

fields.name: Cairn Toul Water Bottle
fields.description1: The Cairn Toul 21oz with Flex Cap is one of the most versatile water bottles available.
fields.description2: With a convenient capacity and a generous opening, it is great for sports drinks or thicker liquids, and can happily accomodate ice cubes. Whether it's for a hot cup of tea on a mountain side or a refreshing gulp of water mid work-out, this flask will have your hydration needs covered.
fields.spec1: Materials: 18/8 Pro Grade Stainless Steel
fields.spec2: Capacity: 21oz (621ml)
fields.spec3: TempShield double wall vacuum insulation: keep hot up to 12 hours

fields.name: Glenfeshie Water Bottle
fields.description1: The Swiss original in a classic design. Made from a single piece of high-quality aluminum, making it light and strong.
fields.description2: It keeps a tight seal, even with carbonated drinks. The highly elastic interior coating is resistant against fruit acids, is tasteless and free from BPA and phthalates. The practical screw cap enables comfortable carrying with just one finger.
fields.spec1: Materials: Aliminium
fields.spec2: Capacity: 1L
fields.spec3: Hand wash only
